table.name: civicrm_campagnodon_transaction_link
table.comment: Link between CampagnodonTransaction and other tables (contributions, ...)

field.name: entity_id
field.title: Entity ID
field.comment: ID of the linked object. Can be null if the object is not created in pending state.

field.name: on_complete
field.title: On complete
field.comment: Only when entity_table='group' or 'contact'. If true, the contact will be added in group only when transaction is complete.

field.name: total_amount
field.comment: Only when entity_table='contribution'. Total amount of this contribution.

field.name: currency
field.comment: Only when entity_table='contribution'. 3 character string, value from config setting or input via user.

field.name: financial_type_id
field.title: Financial Type ID
field.comment: Only when entity_table='contribution'. FK to Financial Type.

field.name: membership_type_id
field.title: Membership Type ID
field.comment: Only when entity_table='contribution'. FK to Membership Type.

field.name: membership_added
field.title: Membership added
field.comment: Only when entity_table='contribution' and membership_type_id not null. True when the membership was added (to prevent multiple membership in case of multiple sync).

field.name: opt_in
field.title: Opt-in
field.comment: An opt-in action to do on the contact.
